channel.title: Am i secure using it like that?
channel.description: I use whonix gateway to connect it with Windows 10 on Virtualbox, before it i have good VPN on my OS, then on the Windows 10 VM i have HTTP proxy (paid anonymously just to be clear) so the connection looks like this: ISP -> VPN -> TOR (VM) -> Proxy -> Internet does that look ok?

item.title: Am i secure using it like that?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Whonix – 18 Jan 22

Microsoft Windows Hosts

Microsoft Windows as Malware, Windows Insecurity, Windows Backdoors, Windows User Freedoms Restrictions, Windows Surveillance, Other Windows Abuses, Inescapable Telemetry

Whonix – 2 Mar 22

Combining Tunnels with Tor

Information on whether Tor gets more or less secure when combining Tor with tunnels such as VPN, SSH, proxies. (User → Tor → proxy/VPN/SSH → Internet) (User → proxy/VPN/SSH → Tor → Internet)

Read full topic
item.source: Am i secure using it like that?

item.title: Am i secure using it like that?
item.dc:creator: libyss
item.description:
I use whonix gateway to connect it with Windows 10 on Virtualbox, before it i have good VPN on my OS, then on the Windows 10 VM i have HTTP proxy (paid anonymously just to be clear) so the connection looks like this:
ISP → VPN → TOR (VM) → Proxy → Internet
does that look ok?

Read full topic
item.source: Am i secure using it like that?
